description: From the Center to the Margins: German Speaking Scholarship on Matthew's Gospel as a Case Study for Matthean Scholarship as a Whole Roland Deines, University of Nottingham Theme: Muslim-Christian Debate and Dialog in Post-Industrial Society Early African American Muslim Perceptions of Jesus Simon A.
